title: Do not buy the foamo soap buy dollar tree baby shampoo
text: [[VIDEOID:8aa0881d4e9c88e4d8fbe2ed840a98de]] I purchased the foamo machine for my son and grandkids from Target yesterday 5/5/21. My daughters had a similar one when they were little in the early 2000's. The refill bottle in Target costs 20.00. Let me teach you a cheaper way. Go to dollar tree and buy 5 bottles of baby shampoo. Pour all 5 in bottom of container. Fill the tub up about1/4 full. Mix around with your hand. You will have good smelling, tear proof foam. Way cheaper and better than the original. I buy about 10 bottles of shampoo so that the kids can have a couple hours of play. We shut it off in between so as to cause the bubbles to last. As they die down turn it back on. DO NOT leave the pump plugged in though it will continue to spill out the top. You must unplug the soap pump it does not have an on/off switch. Unplug it first then turn off the machine. Foamo on trampoline so much nicer.

title: A giftable kit of handy tools for a crafter or hobbyist
text: My husband's a model railroader and I'm an artist. Both of us love this handy kit of useful tools. The craft knives (with extra blades are great for stencils as well as building miniatures. There's a pair of special tweezers for tiny parts or placing small treasures in a collage. There's a round file, a soft brush for whoosing away dust, a bent tool with a fine, sharp point for mosing little things around, scoring, and more. It all comes in a nicely crafted sturdy black canvas-covered zipper case with yellow trim. The case has a cloth loop so you can hang it from a hook in the workroom or studio. It would make a nice gift for a crafter, modeler, or artist. I sure like the one I have!

title: Modeling Fun for All Ages
text:
I ordered this air-dry clay to make 3d models of characters in my picture books. It's easier for me to draw dramatic light and angles if I have something to look at. This kit offers everything I need. Lots of beautiful colors, easy to work with, and no baking necessary. The best way to create something new is to be a kid again, and this set does the trick.

Speaking of kids, that's the intended audience of this set, and it's perfect. Colorful and non-toxic, it's great for creative play. For very young children, who eat everything, it's best with supervision. It's probably okay, but even salt and flour clay you make yourself can be risky these days.

title: Small, Handsome, and Fascinating
text: This little puzzle is a handsome sculpture for a coffee table or bookshelf top. Great to keep geeky guests entertained while waiting for you, sharing a movie they don't really want to see, or spending time with your relatives. It's small enough to hold in your hand and complex enough to keep a puzzle addict absorbed for an hour or two. It comes, assembled, with a helpful little instruction sheet showing how to take it apart and put it together again, if you want to cheat (or practice for a challenge.) When assembled, it fits together tightly enough that it won't come apart if your dog's tail knocks it off on the floor. It takes some effort to loosen the pieces. Recommended for lovers of puzzle boxes and Rubic's Cubes.  Comes in a sturdy (not fancy) cubical cardboard box. You might want to hang onto it to store the pieces, along with the instructions, in case you don't get it back together in one session.

title: This little marker airbrush is a lot of fun. At first
text:
This little marker airbrush is a lot of fun. At first, I was confused by the ingenious marker storage device. I put the markers in the slots, but they wouldn't snap up into place beside the air compressor unit. They just flopped down. Then, I realized I hadn't pressed the compressor unit down hard enough into the base section. You really have to push down hard until you feel and hear the central unit snap into place. Now, the little markers nest up next to the compressor when I'm ready to store them and flare out when I want to play.
The compressor itself runs on four C cells, which are not included. When you buy this gadget, pick up the batteries or you will be ready to play while it just sits there. Don't you just hate that? Okay, so now you have the batteries. You also need a Phillips head screwdriver to open the battery compartment on the bottom of the compressor unit. The good news is, the positive and negative poles are marked and once you get the battery compartment closed you're not going to lose the battery compartment cover. If you getting this for a child, expect to spend some time assembling it. It's not as bad as a bike or a playhouse, but some assembly--and batteries--are required.
Spray painting with the provided marker-like sticks is a lot of fun. You put a stick in the wide end of the spray gizmo attached to the compressor, place a stencil (many are provided) on a sheet of black paper (also provided) and spray away. The compressor is very quiet. The ink, at first, does not seem very intense, but it gets brighter as it dries. There are several projects included, but I think it's more fun to use their elements to make my own designs. I like the KaBoom airbrush very much. If you like it too, you might want to pick up some extra marker sticks.

title: Adorable!
text: [[VIDEOID:1c1943ba3eb5bea18a3413c51ab9527c]]Storytellers, librarians, teachers, this adorable wide-eyed little guy is sure to win your heart and those of your little listeners. He fits neatly over your forearm, and he even has a tail so you can turn him around. His mouth is pink on the bottom and gray on the top (inside) so it is convincing when he speaks. Some puppets are hard to work, but he's comfortable and easy, quickly taking on a personality of his own. (Well, her own, I named mine Sandy, and no, you can't have her!) I made a video of her and me performing a pre-kindergarten poem from my Linworth Learning book "One Just One." I'm used to working with a stage, but I discovered after a few trials that holding Sandy up in front of my face when she talks helps to solve the lip movement problem.

text: My daughter got the whole set for her bday and ended up in tears because they fall apart when you barely move one of their joints.  My advice is to position them to stand up and then superglue their joints in place and use them as static figures or simply put them on a shelf for decoration.  Definitely a major disappointment!  If the joints were stable, these would be uber awesome!  That's the only reason it got an extra star.

title: Perfect toy for my little boy
text: Bought this just before my son was 8 months. He started crawling, and loved to "walk" around holding on to our fingers, so I quickly assembled the walker (super easy, just 2 screws to put in place to attach handle).  He soon started pulling up, and loved (still loves) this walker.  Occasionally he tried to get to it from the front and it falls over, but he is learning to only pull up using the back handle. My boy is not too heavy, so he doesn't have any problems with it being too light and falling over, although babies who are just learning to pull up may need a parent to hold down the front so it doesn't topple over. My son learned quickly, and now rarely has it fall over. I love that you can adjust the tension on the wheels so it doesn't fly across the room. I would certainly recommend this to a friend, and would buy it again in a heartbeat. It is very sturdy construction, and all the wooden block to play with are just a great added bonus in my mind....as my son hasn't even really been interested in them yet.

title: tiger
text: This tiger was purchased along with a big Melissa and Doug lion for Christmas for my daughters.  We also received an additional M&D lion from my parents for Christmas for the girls, meaning we now have 3 large cats at our house.  While our 3 girls ranging in ages from 5-10 love their new animals, they are made poorly.  Having them in our house for less than 24 hours, one lion was noted fresh out of the box with a hole in his head at the top of his face where his mane meets his face.  The tiger has 3 different locations of holes at stitching sites.  Also, true to a real cat's nature, they shed tremendous amounts of fur all over my carpets.  In addition as I'm sure previous reviewers stated one leg is so much longer than the other front leg looks a little weird.  With all this being said, my girls don't mind any of it, and love their new realistic looking big cats. I just wish the stuffing didn't look like it was ready to escape too!

text: Kids are loving this cute drum mat and pairing it with the piano and it's like they've started their own little band. It works great and makes great drum sounds. Kids love using it and coming up with their own songs.

title: Cute Piano
text: Okay, gonna be real honest here ... kids are loving this way too much, the adults not so much. HAHA, But really it's a great piano and works really great. It's cool that it folds or rolls up so that it can be stored, or hid away. Makes all kinds of different sounds and lets the kids make their own kind of music.

title: Kids Love It
text: This pretend teacher's set is really great. I've been doing home school now for months and now my kids get to pretend to be the teacher. It comes with so much great stuff, from a dry erase board that is double-sided, glasses, pointer, and so much more. My kids are having fun, and yes I did say fun, pretending to be the teacher and making them do funny assignments. Such a cute teacher set.

title: Boys Love It
text: My kids love any truck type toy and this one wasn't any different. They like it and have been playing with it along with their other toys. It rolls around easily and is fun to play with from what my boys have said.

title: Fun Craft Kit
text: Super cute jewelry making set that my oldest girl has loved. Even my youngest has wanted to join in with her big sister making bracelets. It is a fun kit and they have been making bracelets for days now for everyone they know. It's got great instructions and the best part is I can get more leather and they can continue to make bracelets for as long as they want. Really fun and love that everything comes in a tin box.

title: Kids Love It
text: Great kitchen playset that my kids love playing with. They love helping me in the kitchen and now when we are doing things they can help out in their own kitchen. Everything is easy to put together and then pack right back up in its cute backpack. It's a great playset for all kids.

title: Kids Love Cooking
text: My kids love helping me in the kitchen so I knew I had to get them this pretend kitchen set. With this set, they can cook right along side me with their own cook sets and pretend food. They also love playing restaurant all the time and creating their own recipes. They are so cute and really love playing with this set.

title: Beautiful Doll House
text: This dollhouse is magnificent, to say the least. Not only is it actually easy to set up and put together but it's beautiful and so very well made. It's made from MDF which makes this thing so heavy, but I know it isn't going anywhere when my kids are playing with it. They love the elevator, that works I might add, and they just love how everything looks. We've already been getting more furniture and stuff and they have really made it their own. Such an awesome dollhouse for sure. Might even say it's better than Barbies dream house.

title: Super Cute
text: This little robot is so stinking cute and I know my kids are going to love them when they get them in their stockings. I have already taken one out and checked it out cause I can haha and it's stinking cute. It's easy to use and record with and is just something super fun and cute. Can't wait to see how my kids like them.

title: Beautiful Brain Teasers
text: I love brain puzzles and these were totally up my alley, for sure. These are so well made too, being made out of real wood, and are just handsome to have and play with. Love this set and the box they come in. Just a great set for yourself or even as a gift for the brainiac in your life. Totally love it.

title: A lot of Fun
text: All of my kids are loving these rainbow scratch pads. They are drawing all kinds of cool things and are just loving the different colors that come up as you are drawing. They have a lot of fun with these notebooks writing and drawing any and everything they want. These are great.

title: Kid Approved
text: My kids and I are loving these jellies so much. They are so squishy and fun to make, also easy to make. Everything comes ready to go in this kit to make your jelly, just about putting it all together and bam, you have your cute little squishy character. Kids love mixing and matching these and just having fun. So super cute and super fun.

title: Amazing Craft Kit
text: Kids are loving this craft kit and everything that comes in it. We've been making all kinds of cards and ornaments for friends and family for the holidays and it's been amazing. They love making all kinds of things and this is perfect. Comes with so many different tools and things to craft with, it's wonderful. Love it so much.

title: Amazing Craft Kit
text: Kids are loving this craft kit and everything that comes in it. We've been making all kinds of cards and ornaments for friends and family for the holidays and it's been amazing. They love making all kinds of things and this is perfect. Comes with so many different tools and things to craft with, it's wonderful. Love it so much.

title: Great Air Dry Clay
text: My kids love making all kinds of things with air dry clay which is really why I got this kit because we go through so much of it. They loved this clay so much. It was soft and easy to work with. It stuck together pretty well and held some details pretty good too. You couldn't get really fine details with this clay but for what my kids love to do this was perfect for them. They loved the little eyes and limbs that came with this kit and they ended up making all kinds of monsters, people, and animals. The storage container is super cute too and works great for storage beyond the air dry clay. Great kit for kids of all ages.

title: Great for All Ages
text: Ok, this tea party whatever party you want to call it is way too stinking cute. Everything is made so great that it looks like my daughters and I are having a real party with cake and everything. The lights on the cake light up and flicker and the music are too cute. It's just such a fun set and we really love it.

title: Not Impressed
text: Ok, so not gonna lie, was pretty disappointed in this kit. The pants worked okay but the suncatchers that came with this kit just weren't all that great and not very cute at all. My kids like a couple of them but really they wished they could make their own or something else. Ended up going to Hobby Lobby and getting plain suncatchers there and a few more paints and made our own that actually cost less and looking so much better. I am sure little kids would have liked this better and probably wouldn't have cared too much about the actual suncatchers but my kids were not impressed with this kit.

title: Great for All Ages
text: Ok, this tea party whatever party you want to call it is way too stinking cute. Everything is made so great that it looks like my daughters and I are having a real party with cake and everything. The lights on the cake light up and flicker and the music are too cute. It's just such a fun set and we really love it.

title: Great Pretend Set
text: Pretend makeup set is awesome and my daughter and her little friends love playing with it and dressing up. They take turns putting on the makeup on one another and just being cuties. Really great set. Everything stays together really nicely and the cute makeup bag makes putting everything up so cute. Great set for sure.

title: Totally Kid Approved
text: My kids love playing with this set so much. They love the sand and the dinos that come with this. They love burying them and then having their own little archeology hunt to find great big dinos. They love digging around with the cool construction toys that come in this set and their own toys too. They love everything about this. I love that everything can stay and be stored in the container with a locking lid. Everything stays inside with no problems.

title: Not the Best
text: Okay, so these weren't the worst crayons that I've ever bought but they were nowhere near the best either. They were super waxy and didn't color very well at all. However, I gave these out in Halloween bags and for that, it was a great addition. I do wish they were a bit better but they worked for what I wanted them for.

title: Great Coloring Book
text: These were super cute and all the kids loved them and loved coloring them. All the pages had fun pictures to color and just were great. Such a great addition to my Halloween bags.

title: Wonderful Bags
text: These bags were awesome for Halloween. All the kids and adults loved them and they fit everything I wanted to put in them with no problems. These were great and I would totally get them again for next year.

title: Beautiful Bag
text: This bag is absolutely beautiful and perfect for storing everything from dice to my beautiful tarot cards. The bag itself is very well made, the stitching is beautiful and everything is just super high quality. A beautiful bag that is perfect for whatever you want it for.

title: Kids are Super Happy
text: Ok, this is way too cool for the kids and I totally wish I had these toys when I was a kid. I mean come one, it actually has running water. That doesn't get all over the place. The toys that come with this are also great and the kids love playing with everything so much. They love to pretend they are helping cook dinner and do the dishes with mommy and daddy and it's just become this fun thing that we all do together. It's super cute and totally well made for the way my kids play with their toys.

title: Super Cute Flowers
text: My little girls are loving these so much that I am going to have to buy another set of these. They are having so much fun making their own flower gardens and making up their own flower types. These are so pretty and so cute too that I wish I had these when I was a kid. These are great and I am happy my little girls love them. Now they have different flowers all the time for their tea parties.

title: Kid Approved
text: I swear my kids can't have enough trucks and things to play with even though they already have so much. They are loving these trucks and the fact that you can just pull them back and let them go, they have been having races with them to see who gets to play with which truck first. These have been awesome in the sandbox and just playing with inside. They wash off without any problems and still look like new. Kids are totally loving these.

title: Kid Approved
text: My kids love helping me in the kitchen and so this lets them cook and bake along with me any time they want. The kit comes with everything from pretend veggies that they can cut and cook in the pots and pans that come in this kit. It comes with utensils and a cute apron that's very well made. I love that everything can be put back in the storage container and stored away when they aren't using it, which isn't very often lol. Great toy that my kids love playing with.

title: Great Christmas Present
text: So I am keeping this one back as a Christmas present for my kid because he loves to build and take apart stuff so I know he is going to love this. He can build so many different things out of this one kit and I love that. I also love the case it comes it, keeping everything together. Great kit that I can't wait to see what he builds from it.

title: Great Building Set
text: My kids are loving these magnetic building tiles. They have been building so many different things including their own little town. Reminds me of Minecraft but they are actually building everything in real life. It's pretty cool and you can add on other building kits and they work great with this one as well. Such a great set that my kids totally enjoy.

title: Super Fun DIY
text:
My daughter loves crafting and making her own jewelry and accessories so she loved this charm kit. Everything was easy to make and use and she was able to make so many different charms for necklaces, bracelets, earrings, you name it.

All the products in the kit are of great quality and the stickers were fun to use and make her own unique charms. Super fun kit and totally want to do more of these now.

title: Great Pretend Makeup Set
text: My little girls love their pretend makeup especially when they can act like they are getting ready with me in the morning. This comes with literally everything to pretend to get ready. Very well put together set and case. Super cute.

title: Great Food Set
text: Kids love these and honesty so do I. These are just way too cute and the fact they just snap together with magnets is genius. This set comes with wooden knives and is just so much fun to have with a kitchen set. Kids love playing with them and acting like they are helping me in the kitchen. Just a great set that is so well made.

title: Great Building Tiles
text: My kids are loving these magnetic tiles way too much. They have built so many different things and even their own town out of these things. They are so colorful and just fun to use. Really lets you use your imagination when building with these. So much fun.

title: Super Cute DIY
text: My oldest is just like me and loves Fairies and everything to do with them. When I showed her these she was over the moon and totally wanted to start making these. They were super easy to make, the jars are plastic, which I am happy about, and go together with all the stuff that included but we also used a lot of craft stuff we had and made them even better than the kit alone. Everything was easy to use and the lights worked great and the lanterns look amazing. My girls love them and have them up in their rooms.

title: Monsters Approve
text: My kid is in love with this crazy monster truck. He has run this thing all through the house, all over his sibs, and everywhere outside. My oldest has totally taken this over and he loves playing with it. He's had his other toys taken out with it and even run from other toys. It seems to handle pretty well and honestly, he doesn't care as long as when he presses the button it goes. lol, The batteries seem to last a good amount of time and it's great that I can have one charging and ready to go in as I change the other out. The really fun monster truck that my little monsters are happy with.

title: Daughter Loves It
text: What's funny is I didn't even know about Trinity and Beyond until I got this for my daughter and she about had a fit because she was so happy. She loves all the little dolls and the jewelry that comes in this and she wears all the stuff everywhere. She had a video playdate the other day and was showing everyone her new jewelry box and new fancy rings and such. It was the cutest thing. My baby girl loves this and that's all that matters.

title: Kid Approved
text: My girl is loving making her own jewelry and charms with this kit. It's so much fun and easy for her to do all on her own. It's also fast drying so we make up everything and the charms are ready to wear in about 20 minutes. A fun kit for sure.

title: Super Cool Game
text: Even though it is starting to get cooler outside, my kids have loved playing this Vikings game. It's so cool with the staff and how it talks and changes colors. I mean, it's such an interactive and fun game. They have so much fun running around and play fighting so this was something that just added so much more fun to their playdates. It's such a cool game and they are loving it.

title: The Perfect Terrain Map Set
text: This is one of the best game mat sets I have come across. I am so super impressed with this set. First, the maps themselves are amazing. They are super detailed and takes playing D&D to a whole new level with these maps. We make our own games and these maps let us come up with some amazing things. Also, love that these aren't folded or creased so they always unfold perfectly, and with the clips I can have them flattened out within seconds and ready to play on. The dice and markers were an added bonus that I wasn't expecting. These maps are laminated so the dry erase markers are awesome to include so that things can be drawn on the different terrains and then quickly erased without problems. The dice are cool too, especially since I am a dice hoarder and love a good set of dice. Overall this set is amazing and I could not be happier with this set. It's totally worth every single penny and more.

title: Super Fun
text: My kids are loving this game way too much. They are having too much fun watching the drone launch and see who can get their aliens to it first. It's super fun to play and even easier to set up. We started playing within minutes and they are actually playing this game right now. It's a lot of fun and they have even invited their friends over to play it too. A big hit in this house.

title: Great Scissors
text: Scissors are great and work just as they should. Great color and super sharp. They cut great and feel great in the hands.

title: Super Cute Headband
text: This headband is so stinking cute and I totally love it. It fits great and looks even better. Great to wear any time or for a costume. Easy to wear and very comfortable.

title: So Stinkin Cute
text: I am a huge Halloween fan and this is an awesome addition to my collection. It's so cute and sweet which I just love. As always it is great quality and I love it.

title: So Freakin Cute
text: I love Pop figures and I am not disappointed at all with this one. I love Grumpy Bear and this Pop is just so grumpy and sassy. I love it. As always with Pop figures, this one is very well made and is just adorable. Very happy with my Grumpy.

title: Beautiful Dice
text: These dice are great for any player or collector. These are beautiful and they feel great in the hand. They are very well made and very detailed. They also have a great weight to them, which makes throwing them so very nice. They are so awesome and being a dice hoarder they are the perfect set for my collection.

title: Freaking awesome Trunk
text: This trunk is so stinking cute as it gobbles up my dice. It looks just like the picture and is exactly as described. It's made fairly well too. It's super heavy for it's the size and looks great on the inside. I do with the paint job could have been a bit better, especially on the eye, making it a different color or something to make it stand out more, but overall it's a great looking trunk. It doesn't come with a lock, like I was thinking it would, which is fine but would have been fun for it to come with the lock shown in the pictures. Also, the latch is made of very thin metal and as long as you take care of the box I think it will last a while. Overall it's a great trunk to store all your dice when they aren't being used, and just a great piece to have for D&D players and collectors.

title: Great for Collectors
text: I am a huge Pokemon fan and Gyarados is one of my favorites. I am in love with this figure so much. It was fun to build and looks so cool on my shelf. It's totally cool and can't wait to get more for my collection.

title: Loads of Fun
text: I don't know if my husband or kids love this nerf bow more. They are all the time having nerf wars and this is one of their favorites. It loads quickly and shoots even quicker. They have way too much fun and it's held up really well to all the abuse it goes through with them. They are having too much fun with this.

title: Great for the Littles
text: This is great for little kids. You push a car in and it goes around the track and does different loops. Little kids love watching the car to go through and everything. Super fun to play with and they seem to really love it. Very sturdy and easy to set up for the kiddos.

title: Super Cute Doggie
text: This plush puppy is the cutest and my girls love it. I've already had to buy another one because they, of course, never wanted to share it. It goes everywhere with them. It's super soft and cuddly. Easy to wash as I've thrown it in the wash many times. So far it has come out perfect every time. Just a cute plush dog.

title: So Stinkin Cute
text: These bags are so stinking cute but you need a huge gift to put in these for it to actually look good. But it's so cute and honestly, if you wanted to just fill this up for a person with all of their gifts, it'd totally be cool and I'd take it in a heartbeat. These bags are huge and honestly, you could totally stuff them and put them outside as people do for Halloween with the pumpkin bags, use these and have Santa bags. lol Anyway, these are great but they are just plastic bags so be careful with how much the stuff weights because they do tear pretty easy.

title: Kids Love This
text: According to my kids, this is a pretty cool transforming toy. It transforms from this weird gray box into this really cool attack plane/chopper. It works every time you put the little mini car in so there are a lot of air attacks happening at my house with this thing. It's a cool toy that my boys have informed me that it's like it's a cross between transformers and a star wars toy, so that's cool. They have also already started asking for the other sets like the sonic jet. Yeah, I'd say my kids love this toy.

title: Total Waste of Money
text: Well, this was a stupid waste of money. It's so much show that just didn't need to be done with perfume. It's super messy and a huge pain to use and clean up after. The scents start mixing together and it's hard to know what you are mixing together anymore. It's was a nice idea but just didn't need to be done. You also only get two scents in this kit, which what are you going to do with two scents that do not complement one another. Ugh, this could have actually might have been a good kit but you don't get anything in it. They want you to use stuff around your house to make other scents but what's the point of buying a DIY kit if you don't get anything in it to make anything worth making. Ugh, don't waste your money on this, for real.

title: New Hobby Acquired
text: I wasn't sure if my girls would like this activity kit but it turns out they not only loved this kit but they have already gotten to me buy them more stuff so they could make more string art. They love making different animals and pictures and have already roped their friends into as well. It's a great project for them and also it's a pretty great time to spend with your kids too. Just a fun activity for us, for sure.

title: So Many Things to Build
text: My kids love building all kinds of stuff and they are obsessed with these k'nex sets. They love these and play with them all the time. They used to always take them with them when they would go to school because they loved building all kinds of things and then sharing it with their friends. I love that these are made very well and can be used to build so many things that can actually move and do things. Not just some stationary objects like you do with Legos. Such a great kit that gets kids interested in building and science.

title: Great Toy
text: My kids love building all kinds of stuff and they are obsessed with these k'nex sets. They love these and play with them all the time. They used to always take them with them when they would go to school because they loved building all kinds of things and then sharing it with their friends. title: So Much Fun
text: A fun game as you try to figure out who the real villain is and who keeps stealing stuff. It's so fun to play with a load of people and it can get a bit out of hand but then again, that's a sign of a good game.

title: Kids Love this Toy
text: My kids went crazy when they got their hands on this electronic car. They love Marvel and they are totally in love with this. They are always running this around the house and tormenting our cats. Just a great toy that has held together with two boys.

title: Super Cute
text: I gave this as a baby gift and the baby loves it. She plays with it all the time and is so amazed by the piano and the sounds it makes. The teether is nice and chewy and she is always slobbering and chewing on it as her teeth begin to come in. She is too cute when playing with these and just loves them.

title: Waste of Money
text: Not gonna lie, this kit is totally lame. You can get everything in this kit at the dollar store and do so many more experiments that you can with this lame kit. Honestly, save your money and just go to the dollar store to get the gel beads and slime making ingredients, I promise you will have a lot better time than what you would with this kit.

title: Great Little Toys
text: Kids love these things. I find these all over the house from the living room and bedrooms to even the bathroom. And not only do the kids love them but the cats seem to love playing with them as well. I have woken up many times to the cats chasing these around the house. So, these are also great for your pets too. haha They also have held up to everything and still look great and work just as they did when they first got them.

title: Too Cute
text: Where was this stuff when I was growing up? I love this little princess house and it is so much fun to play with. I will get down and play with my daughter for hours just doing different things and such. It's also built really tough because it doesn't matter how gentle you are with things, it gets knocked around by kids no matter what. So far it has held up to so much, even a fight between princess and soldiers. lol It's so great to play with and your kids will totally love it.

title: Waste of Money
text: I am not going to pretend that this is a good product. It's pretty horrible. The stickers, which is what these are, barely stick to your hair and let's be honest, they are tacky at best. You get a comb, big woop, and then a bunch of other junk that is supposed to keep all your gems together and whatever but it's all junk. Just don't waste your money on this because it's not fun and honestly my kids hated it and were pretty let down by it.

title: Great Collectable
text: I'm a huge Nightmare Before Christmas fan and this is a great addition to my collection. It's super cute and very well made. I wouldn't expect anything less from Funko. Great figure.

title: Love This Figure
text: I am a huge fallout fan and this pop does not disappoint. I love the packaging and the overall figure itself. It's great quality and looks so great with all my other figures. Very happy with it.

title: Not Worth The Money
text: First, this is a paint a rock set. The paint is okay but it flakes off after a while, the paintbrush is crap. If you want to do any kind of detail or make an actual straight line then don't use the brush in this kit. The rocks are actually pretty cute and I like that you fit them together to make the animal. Now if everything else was as good, it would be an awesome kit. My suggestion, go to Hobby Lobby and buy the paints and rocks yourself. That way you can make all the animals you want and it would cost you less than this kit.

title: Fun and Great Clock Making Kit

Love these kits and will be getting more soon.

text: This game is so much fun and even more fun when you have a big group of people playing. I have to admit though that it gets pretty crazy the more people you get to play but it is a great time had all around. Such a fun game that my friends and I love playing on game nights.

Just the artwork alone makes this game something that everyone should play at least once but once you play it you will want to play it more and more.

My boyfriend even went out and bought more of the little spin things so they had more to play with and more to put into the ring. They love this game and just really enjoy playing it together. It is so funny to watch them really go at it. Great game for kids and adults a like. Even I love to throw down and beat my boyfriend a couple of times in this game. It's really fun with more spin things.

text: So this Barbie has been such a big hit with my boyfriends baby girl. She loves her Barbies and like her Kweestal she loves her video games too. So this Barbie was totally perfect for her. She loves taking her around and playing games with her and even loves to have her sit and watch her and I play games. The little things that came with this Barbie were too cute and just fit so perfectly in with the gaming theme. We love this Barbie.

Watching grown adults try to get rings on a spinning hook is hilarious and then watching them jump and scream at a plastic spider flying at them, just priceless. This is a great game and lots of fun for all ages.

title: So Much Fun
text: These are great little building pieces and they can be added to other sets like these to make even more cooler and bigger stuff. Love these because they glow in the dark and they look really awesome doing it. These are awesome and seriously my boyfriends kids love these things and so do we.

title: A Lot of Fun
text: My boyfriends daughter loves this crown and game so much. She is always playing with it and wearing the crown even when she isn't playing the game. The music is fun and she loves dancing around and getting us to dance with her, making up her own moves and such. It's just a fun thing for kids and the fact that she loves playing with this even when she isn't playing the game is just great. It's so easy to use and play and everything is done through the crown itself. It's a great and fun game and the kids just love it.

title: Awesome Game
text: My friends and I love this game so much. We have a blast playing it and the things that we come up with are just way too funny. It's a fast paced and totally easy game to play. Having only 5 seconds to think of stuff, I thought, would be a tough challenge, and it totally is but it is totally funny the things we do come up with in this game. Totally a winner at game night for me any my friends.

title: Great for Everyone
text:
What an amazing rock tumbler. I have had a few of these in the past and none of them have ever been even close to as good as this one nor did they ever come with the stuff that came with this kit. The fact that it comes with a half a pound of stones makes this kit great but add in the polishing stuff and then the actual quality of the tumbler and you have one of the best kits on the market.

The tumbler itself is made out of heavy steal so it stays where you put it and doesn't slide or move around like other tumblers would do. The barrel itself is perfect being made out of heavy rubber with a lid that fits tightly so nothing comes out and everything stays securely inside the barrel. Another great part about this kit is the fact that the barrel being made out of heavy rubber it makes it more insulated which makes it much quieter to use than other tumblers. Because I can tell you that other tumblers were loud and because it took days to polish the rocks that it was not a fun or quiet hobby to do in your house. However, with this kit it is so much quieter that you can have it set up in a spare room or even the dining room and you won't hear it all through the house.

This is a wonderful tumbler set for any age and because I make jewelry it helps cut down on a lot of the cost when it comes to buying pre-polished stones. Now I can do it myself and it's so much more cost effective and my bottom line loves that. Great set that I will continue to use for years to come.

title: Works Pefect
text: The 3D Pen I had finally died on me after about 3 years and I can tell you right now that I got a lot of use out of it so I was in the market for a new one when I found this one. I have to say that I am in love with this 3D Pen as it is so much better than my old one. For one thing it is much smaller, lighter, and fits into the hand as if it was a large pencil. It's also much easier to control too as the plastic comes out. It isn't spotty in some areas and goes together so much more smoother and just better. It's also easier having the plastic go into the back of the pen instead of the top side because it doesn't get wrapped into everything. This pen is just great and I love using it. The button placement is perfect and goes along with the hand and fingers much better. All in all a great 3D pen that I can't wait to keep using.

title: Nice Little Doll
text: My boyfriend's little girl ended up loving this cute little doll. She loved the cute little stickers that came with it and the lamp shaped hair brush. She plays with it all the time and just really likes it. Not sure how long the doll will actually last because she has already lost her shoes but who knows, otherwise it's a great little doll..

title: This game turned out to be a lot of fun and considering how much I really like GhostBusters it ...
text: This game turned out to be a lot of fun and considering how much I really like GhostBusters it made it even better. It was really easy to play and all the pieces looked great. The game board itself is very well made and looks great too. Everything about this game is great and everyone is sure to have a great time playing it because I know me and my friends sure did.

title: Fun Activity For Everyone
text:
String art seems to be something that is coming back as it was something that was really popular back in the 70s. I actually love string art and some of the things that can be done with string is pretty amazing.

With this kit you can make a beautiful 3D star and I have to tell you it is not only super fun but totally easy. The instructions are super easy to follow and putting together the pieces once you are finished is even easier. Once everything is put together it looks great. The colors go together wonderfully and it just looks great. I love the colors and I've even added in some of my own.

This is a great activity for kids and anyone who likes to do crafts. It's totally fun, easy to do and looks great when you hang it up. Great for everyone.

title: Fun Building Set
text:
These are great toys and perfect for kids. You can build so many different toys just with this one kit. I ended up getting two of these and combining them together and my cousin has had a field day with it. She has went through and built some awesome things and the fact you can make them move and put motors in them makes it even more fun. We've been running through the house chasing the cats with the cool cars we've been building.

These building kits are awesome. The pieces go together in such a smart way that they stay together so no worries about the pieces falling apart so it's totally safe for children to play with. We are so happy with these construction toys and want to get more to add to our collection. We think of them as the more advanced legos because these are just awesome.

title: Totally Fun Game
text: I love the original Outburst but this one is just crazy fun and totally for the more adult crowd. The top 10 lists are hilarious and my friends have a time playing this fun game. We have game nights a couple of times a month and this game has quickly become a favorite. We have loads of fun playing this game and discovering these way to out there top 10 lists.

title: So Much Fun
text: I love shrinky dinks so much! I remember being a kid and making them all the time. I got these for my boyfriends daughter and we have been having the best time coloring and watching these shrink down in the oven. These are so totally cute and watching them curl up and shrink down is magical. It's a great set and we have made so many keychains and necklaces from this one little pack. Can't wait to do more of them because this project does make for a great afternoon with the kids.

title: Very Fun Geo Kit
text: When I was a kid I dreamt of becoming a great explorer and finding all kinds of beautiful geodes and artifacts from all over the world. To this day I still love all of the beautiful crystals and rocks that can be found all over. This kit is something that is just too much fun. It comes with two "rocks" that you can excavate and crack open to see what kind of beautiful rocks are hidden inside. I can't lie and say that the tools that come with this are the best because it's just plastic tools that really don't work very well but this kit is still a lot of fun and by looking at the tools you can find something better around the house that works better at digging through these rocks. This kit has also inspired me to make my own geo rocks and do more explorations. It's great fun for all ages.

title: Lots of Fun
text: This was a cool < pun intended lol > science kit. It came with everything you needed to create a winter wonderland in your own living room. The snow itself is a polymer compound that when you add water to it, it grows and becomes a snow like product. It's not something that you can eat or that will melt if left out but is fun to play with and build things with such as snowballs and snow forts. It bonds together pretty well and is totally fun to play with.

title: Very Fun and Interactive Kit
text: Such a creative and very well made building kit for kids of all ages. My cousins son is so into space and exploration and when he saw this kit his eyes just lit up and he tore right into it. He built everything that was suggested in this kit and then started building things on his own. He played with this for hours and had so much fun with it. All of the pieces go together perfectly and he didn't have any problems or troubles with anything in this kit. He loved going to other planets and discovering new worlds with this inventive toy. From my what cousin tells me he still loves playing with this kit and has even took it to school with him multiple times where the kids are wanting one for themselves. It's a great kit and kids have so much fun with it.

title: A Whole Lot of Fun
text: o, the app is only on the iPhone or through iTunes right now and you can't get it on Android, which is all I use. So, with that said I had to use my friends phone to try this puppy out but I was happy to try it out because we both loved it. The app itself was easy to download and install. You sync the airjamz to the app and you are ready to go. There are a lot of songs to choose from and from what the company has said there are a lot more to come, along with being able to play it on Android devices, which I will be happy about. This is something totally cool and new to play with and you just need the little pick and you can play all kinds of cool songs. Really cool little toy that me and my friends really loved playing with.

title: Fun Game
text: This is a pretty fun game for kids and adults alike. There are so many different ways to play that I don't know of another game that can be played so many different ways with all the same stuff. It was fun shooting the rubber bands and knocking all the blocks down and seeing how many points we could rack up. I have to say that all of the rubber band flicking I did back in high school really came in handy with this game. haha It's a really fun game for a game night and just on a rainy day.

title: Could Have Been So Much Better
text:
This is such a huge disappointment. Seriously, the only thing this kit is good for is for the pretty test tubes. Other than that it is pretty useless. You don't get anything in this kit that you can't find in your kitchen to do the same experiments. What makes it even worse, it is marketed towards young girls, and I would bet if it were marketed for boys it would have way cooler experiments than baking soda and vinegar powder. Seriously, do they not think that girls want things to explode and make a mess too. I know I do and so did my cousin who was trying this out with me. It was super disappointing and we did better stuff with the things I had in my kitchen than I did with the lousy powders you get in this kit. I am very happy that they have science kits that are marketed towards girls and trying to get girls more interested in science but give us some awesome experiments and not these unimpressive so called "experiments".

Also, I can see that you can buy other kits to go with this one and hopefully those will make up for these lame experiments. So, if you buy this kit at least buy one of the expansion kits so that your kid isn't too disappointed. Either do that, or look online and check out some really cool experiments you can do from things you have right in your kitchen. I promise they will love them and you can use the equipment that comes in this kit to do the more awesome experiments with.

title: Great for Kids and Adults
text:
I have to be honest, I got this telescope for myself because ever since I was a kid I have loved astronomy and have wanted a telescope. Well, I finally have one now and I am totally in love. I have used a few telescopes before in my life but it has been a very long time. However, this one was very simple to set up and use. It has a very nice sturdy tripod that comes with it and it's easy to put on the telescope. Everything fits together perfectly and you can get this telescope put together and star gazing in no time.

I am super impressed with how well it works. I have used it outside looking at the moon and stars and I have also used it inside looking through a window. I have to say, that both places worked very well and I had no problems seeing through the telescope. I loved how well I could see the moon and yes, even the surface and craters. I could also see loads up stars up close and it was just magical, to say the least.

I've not bothered with any of the activity books but from what I could tell they are pretty good and would be great for kids to learn more about the stars and galaxy. The meteorite that comes in this is pretty cool and I am a sucker for anything to do with space so it's something cool to have.

If my review has helped you in any way, please let me know by clicking below!

title: Great Puzzle and so Much Fun
text: I remember when 3D puzzles first came out and I was instantly in love with them because I hadn't seen anything like them. Cut to today and I still love them and I don't even like putting together normal puzzles but these 3D puzzles are really awesome. This one is as good as the name brand ones and honestly a little better. These aren't cardboard pieces but instead are hard plastic pieces so you don't need glue or anything to keep the pieces together. All of the pieces fit together nicely and stay together very tightly. The details and the colors on each piece is very good and just looks beautiful when put together. I couldn't be happier with this puzzle and it looks so great. I am very happy with the way Lady Liberty came together and it was so much fun to put together.

title: So Much Fun

This game is great and totally hilarious when you get me and my friends together and we are playing this game. Acting out all of the different things is just way to much fun but us trying to guess is just too much. This game is great and super simple to play. We've just started playing this game and we are already addicted to it. Every time we are talking about a game night everyone wants me to bring this game. We love it.

I loved every minute of it and it's become a favorite in my friends and my game night.

title: Loving the New Version

I have a game night at least a couple of times a month and this game has become an added addition to the games to be played. It's great fun freezing each other and trying to make it home before anyone else. Such a great family and friends game.

title: Highly Articulated; A GREAT Addition to the Collection
text:
I am very happy with my Barbie Signature Looks Ken Doll. He arrived in good condition with some cosmetic damage to the packaging. I had already placed a pre-order for this same Ken Doll directly from Mattel. I decided that I liked this model of Ken so much, that I wanted to have a second that I could feel free to open and re-dress for display. I am an adult collector, but find that this Ken would be completely appropriate for play. I do not advise to alter his hairstyle as the plugs are thick and do not look attractive if it's untied.

In fact, I find this doll would be much better for children than the terrible budget ones available in most local big-box stores as this doll is completely articulated. Most of the budget dolls are not great for play because they cannot move their elbows and often even legs to use a chair! This doll can use a doll-sized cell phone, hold a doll-sized drink and be posed in many different ways. He is a great doll for practicing photography skills. In fact, I like to use these dolls with good articulation to do a series of photos that I call 'photo-stories'. I do not draw very well, so I like to use articulated dolls as models to tell short little stories that I later share with other adult doll collectors. title: Many Accessories Included; Many Potentially Frustrating Issues
text:
I am overall satisfied with my order of the Simba Steffi Love Camper Set. This arrived very well packaged for shipping. It was not overly difficult to remove from the box as most of the securing straps simply untied. There were several pieces of clear tape that needed to be removed. I do like that this set included a Steffi Love doll. It's an overall nice doll with articulated ankles and knees. I do wish that the elbows were also articulated, but they are not. She has shoes, a simple dress and sunglasses. She has underpants imprinted on her plastic pelvis. I do not advise to remove the elastic on her hair as the plugged hair will show the widely spaced hair plugs and be less than attractive.

The first impression of the playset inside the packaging is that it's very cute and attractive. The camper itself is not as durable as I had hoped. This will not stand up to rough play. I would not at all advise this to be accessible to toddlers or careless children because if one tried to use it as a seat or step-stool, it would break easily. The wheels are held in place with a metal rod, this would be a safety hazard if it came out of place. The many small accessories are also not appropriate for very small children as they could pose a choking hazard. There is not enough leg room in the two front seats for the doll's legs, they must be bent to the side or the doll has to sit sideways. Not all of the doors are well-molded to close completely. Some stickers are included, which is nice as one side of the camper already is decorated with stickers, leaving the opposite side blank. Several packets of accessories are included so the dolls can use props for various activities such as cooking, lounging and even showering. The small accessories are the best point of this playset.

I personally do not find this camper set to be a good value at it's current price point. There are too many issues that will lead to frustration in play. Primarily, the type of plastic material used to mold the camper is prone to failure as it's not at all durable. The play patterns of most small children will prove to be the source of frustration or failure of the toy. This type of plastic is prone to shattering and can produce sharp edges if broken. For many children, this will be a short-lived disposable toy. This would be most ideal for children that play gently and are able to keep small toys well organized and enjoy playing with fashion dolls. The camper itself measures about 22" long, 11" wide and 9 1/2" tall. This will need a significant amount of storage space, and would not easily withstand being stored stacked with other toys in a toybox. This would be best 'parked' under a bed, in a closet or on a shelf between play sessions to avoid a tripping hazard. I hope that my experience with this camper set is helpful as you kindly click the button below.
